General.Name: Eagle Cold Storage Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Eagle Cold Storage Enterprise Co., Ltd. engages in the processing and trading of vegetables and frozen meat products in Taiwan. It offers frozen beef, hot pot meat slices, and canned products, as well as imports and sells meat, French fries, green beans, and other commodities. The company also leases refrigerated and frozen warehouses for vegetables, fruits, fish, meat, ice, and other related products. In addition, it manufactures agricultural products and food. Further, the company constructs, rents, and sells residential and commercial buildings. Additionally, it offers logistics services and operates online food store. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
